title: Neon
desc:
Post 364
*glowy*
- Glow so hard as to either peek into another players hand or to reveal the next 5 cards to the whole board.
- if you choose to reveal the cards, you may rearrange the cards in any order, without telling the other players the new order.
- As a noble gas, This card is immune to any backlash or negative effect peeking into another hand may cause. Nor may it be stopped by any means.
